The Penn State University Libraries will host a panel discussion on the topic "We are enough: Practical open access for everyone," featuring Peter Suber, Sarah Lamdan, and Dr. Samuel Moore on Thursday, October 23, 2025, from 11:00 am to 12:30 pm EDT via Zoom. Jeff Edwards will moderate.

The event is part of Open Access Week.

To participate, follow [this link](https://psu.mediaspace.kaltura.com/media/Open%20Access%20Week%202025%20at%20the%20Penn%20State%20University%20Libraries/1_9xqb5c9t)
